post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
As the title says, you should answer and explain similar but different collection objects' features. There might be several questions on real examples which object is appropriate.
These are the objects frequently mentioned.
1. Vector vs. ArrayList 2. Hashtable vs. HashMap 3. String vs. StringBuffer
Anything else? please attach your ideas. Thanks.
post.title: Distinguish collection objects
